name: Howard Johnson Express Inn - Pensacola

reviews.text: Basic motel right off the freeway with interior halls. It's old and a little worn (the tub was chipped and you could see where an old towel rack used to be before they did a lousy patch and paint job) but the room was clean (as was the fridge) and quiet. The linens were clean but the pillows very thin.
reviews.title: Good, basic lodging, pet friendly
Barely adequate
reviews.text: They accept pets of any size with a flat fee, and most of the guests I saw were travelling with them. There is a large grassy area in the middle of the property which is excellent for letting the dogs run.

reviews.title: Clean and comfortable
reviews.text: The continental breakfast isn't much to write home about, but it's free, and there's a Waffle House next door if you want something hot and greasy.

reviews.title: Nice Place
reviews.text: If you're looking for a quiet place to stop for the night after a long drive that accepts pets without a fuss, stop here.

aka: Howard Johnson Express Inn (Pensacola Blvd) Hotel
